author: cent
title: NFT Verification Tool (Open-Source)
description: There is a lack of community driven, open source tools, resources and standards to further develop the NFT industry on Cardano.
solution: A collaborative and aligned approach and process to explore and establish tools, standards and resources to generate value for Cardano NFTs
experience: 20 years developer experience, SPOs, on-chain data verification tool creator, NFT creators, and dedicated community members.
